*p**location_mentioned*Nashville Tenn.*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-10-1832">Sept. 10. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Colonel*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Genl. A. Houston*/person_mentioned* of this *location_mentioned*town */location_mentioned*is a going to depart for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* in a *date_mentioned n="09-12-1832">day or two*/date_mentioned*, he is going by the way *location_mentioned*Arkansas Territory,*/location_mentioned* it will take him until in the month of *date_mentioned n="12-xx-1832">Decr*/date_mentioned*, sometime to reach you, I have given him a letter of introduction to you which he will hand you on his arrival there, I am not informed of his views in Visiting that *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, I think he would be a great addition to Our *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*as a *person_mentioned*Citizen*/person_mentioned*, he is a very intimate *person_mentioned*friend of the President*/person_mentioned*s and has a great number of *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*acquaintances */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*. I think it would be well worth your trouble to try and Make him a *person_mentioned*Citizen of your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I have seen several accounts in the *location_mentioned*news papers*/location_mentioned* Respecting a considerable difficulty in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*between the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Mexican troops*/person_mentioned* Stationed in your colony*/location_mentioned* which terminated in a total route of them from that part of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, I also saw an account in a *location_mentioned*New Orleans paper*/location_mentioned* of the arrival of four or five hundred *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*from *person_mentioned*Genl. Santa Anna */person_mentioned*and several ships of the line which will be a great advantage to the *person_mentioned*Americans*/person_mentioned*, if an attack was made on them by *person_mentioned*Genl. Bustamenta*/person_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*party*/person_mentioned*. I have no doubt but it will be an advantage to the *person_mentioned*Colonists */person_mentioned*in future to Keep those *person_mentioned*Mexicans */person_mentioned*from interfering with there Rights and privileges.*/p*
*p*I have nothing in the way of news to write that would interest you, The *person_mentioned*prest. of the *location_mentioned*U. States*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* has been in *location_mentioned*Nashville */location_mentioned*and its vi- cinity for *date_mentioned n="08-29-1832">two weeks past*/date_mentioned* which has caused a considerable stir here I think of leaving here for *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*about the *date_mentioned n="12-20-1832">20. of Decr. next.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Leander H McNeil*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Filipe de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Politeness of *person_mentioned*Genl. Houston.*/person_mentioned**/p*
